ISSUE.TITLE: Error starting project a bytes-like object is required, not 'str'"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Starting AWX in a Docker container fails ##### ENVIRONMENT * AWX version: 9.0.1 * AWX install method: Docker in Docker * Ansible version: 2.9.1 * Operating System: Ubuntu 18.04 * Web Browser: - ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE Build, Ship & Run AWX via Dockerfile ( eg: https://hub.docker.com/r/twobombs/ansibleawx ) ##### EXPECTED RESULTS AWX login UI ##### ACTUAL RESULTS fatal: [localhost]: FAILED! => {"changed": false, "errors": [], "module_stderr": "Creating awx_postgres ... 
Creating awx_memcached ... 
Creating awx_rabbitmq ... 
[2A[2K
Creating awx_memcached ... 
[2B[1A[2K
Creating awx_rabbitmq ... 
[1B[3A[2K
Creating awx_postgres ... 
[3BCreating awx_web ... 
", "module_stdout": "3.7.4: Pulling from ansible/awx_rabbitmq
Digest: sha256:3ff448f979149a0684c61b0f00eb0fe7bc480b123323aa80fb3bb8934027f895
Status: Downloaded newer image for ansible/awx_rabbitmq:3.7.4
alpine: Pulling from library/memcached
Digest: sha256:3cfb2eee0b618722a62f4cc907fa0ede848efa87d773bb9384044f490926e7ce
Status: Downloaded newer image for memcached:alpine
10: Pulling from library/postgres
Digest: sha256:9ab0b88aae58f006e8da0e4f32678881fcb2eaae5154bb1a369733983d21b370
Status: Downloaded newer image for postgres:10
9.0.1: Pulling from ansible/awx_web
Digest: sha256:c14ae37e0e8836573443a2f4d7c75afb26658065ca36ac9688dc1b8251da6477
Status: Downloaded newer image for ansible/awx_web:9.0.1
9.0.1: Pulling from ansible/awx_task
Digest: sha256:d2d4ba190526fbbb2ecea3c024aec50626b18d9b1ade4620d5a7c24388e79371
Status: Downloaded newer image for ansible/awx_task:9.0.1
", "msg": "**Error starting project a bytes-like object is required, not 'str'"**} ##### ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ![Screenshot 2019-11-19 at 14 15 11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12692227/69149767-7b3c0980-0ad7-11ea-964b-c8ab55851558.png) At first I got no error information, but after forcing to a python3 only install for AWX I finally got an error.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5350 from ansible/leave_a_mess_second [4.1] Respect work unit and file cleanup settings (3rd try)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5351 from ansible/exec_node_error_handling [4.1] Improve Error Handling for When Job Cannot Be Delivered to an Execution Node
